message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $175?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer.  Could you meet me halfway at $187.50?  I'm trying to find a fair price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your attempt to find a fair price. I would like to counter with an offer of $180 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
